description: While we were in Arizona looking for hot guys, we came across Angel, a great looking stud with attitude.While we were filling up our rental car at a gas station, Angel rode up on a dirt bike. Just the way he carried himself, we knew we'd have to approach him...somehow. We didn't just want to walk up to this guy and say 'Hey, want to jerk off for us?'.So we concocted a plan and asked him if he ever thought about getting into the porn industry. His eyes lit up when we asked, and he wondered if we could help him out. Oh yes, of course we could help our good looking newfound friend. So here he is, Angel, playing with himself on the couch, washing and stroking in the shower, and a nice load shot while he lays on the bed. Enjoy!
title: Angel B
